name: Altocumulus
author: Jason Morrison

sections.description:
A big cloud of all your blog’s tags is cool and all, but I thought it might be
fun to try to integrate tags into the whole navigation scheme. Altocumulus will place a cloud of related tags at the top of your Category and Tag pages.

If people are interested and I have the time I’ll try adding more
functionality. Thanks for trying it out.

You can see a sample on the internet.
sections.installation:
1. Upload tag-altocumulus.php to the /wp-content/altocumulus/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

That’s all there is to it.
sections.faq:
Why isn’t think working on my blog / in my theme?

I don’t know – this is brand new. Drop me a line and maybe we can figure it out. My home page.
